cab.content: S E OWE T.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 3rd OCTOBER, 1918.WESTERN FRONT. British Front *On the ST .QUBNTIN front we hold MONTBREHAIN but not BEAUREVOIR,Unconfirmed reports say that cavalry and light tanks have captured FRESNOY, also a railway train at that place *On the LA BASSES front we have occupied LENS, VENDIN LE VIEIL, SINGLES, BILLY, HANTAY, WICRES, HERLIES, BOIS GRENIER.There is nothing to report on the YPRES front-French Front *There is nothing to report.ITALIAN5 MACEDONIAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS * There io nothing to report *General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. 3rd October, 1918. Issued at 6 ?45 p.m.
